content:
Hospitals, pumping and other critical infrastructure facilities will switch to generators.

About thisIn the evening of March 24 reportedChairman of the Defense Council of Kryvyi Rih Alexander Vilkul.

“I remind you that we have 213 points of indomitable, in which everything is available. Also, please charge the gadgets and Perebank, ”Alexander Vilkul advised.

In the morning, he reported, after a night attack by rockets and Shahaneda, the objects of energy infrastructure of the city were damaged.

Asreported the armyinform, at night, Russia used to hit the winged rocket X-101/X-555 and shock UAV Shahd.
title: In Kryvyi Rih, schedules of emergency power outages were introduced
description: On the evening of March 24, the chairman of the Defense Council of Kryvyi Rih Alexander Vilkul announced. ...
author: Army Inform
